title: S5 Ep40: Our workless future
itunes:title: Our workless future
description: As intelligent autonomous machines become better at doing all our jobs, will there be enough work and income to go around? If only some of us work, who will that be, and what happens to the rest of us? Anton Korinek talks to Tim Phillips.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
